name: Media Query Visibility
description: Responsive helper that shows primary or alternate content based on width constraints.

use: you need conditional layout for breakpoints.
avoid: a single layout can adapt with `LayoutBuilder`.

examples.minimal:
MediaQueryVisibility(
  minWidth: 600,
  child: Text('Desktop layout'),
  alternate: Text('Mobile layout'),
)

accessibility: Ensure alternate content is equivalent in meaning.
do: Keep breakpoints consistent across the app.
dont: Hide critical actions in alternate layouts.
